description:
1 BED APT IN LONG ISLAND CITY, 3 BLOCKS FROM TRAIN STATION 15 MIN  MIDTOWN.

THIS IS WALK-UP 3RD FLOOR "NO ELEVATOR"

DELI, SUPERMARKET CLOSE BY 

My place is close to MIDTOWN, TIMES SQUARE, Villa Brazil Café & Grill, United Artists Kaufman Astoria Stadium 14 Movie Theater, The Yoga Room, Studio Square, Astoria Seafood. You’ll love my place because of the kitchen, the location, the coziness, PRIVACY. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: 1 BED APT GREAT FOR FAMILIES/COUPLES NYC
review: Raul deserves an AirBnB good service medal - he stayed up very late (2 am) to get me into the apartment on a snowy night when my flight had been delayed 8 hours due to the weather.  That was very much appreciated.  His place is very convenient, a short walk to the subway (5 minutes) and a 15 minute ride to Times Square with very frequent trains at almost any hour.  The apartment is in one of those old classic buildings, I was very comfortable and had everything I needed for a cold winter week in New York on business.  The area seemed very safe, some older residential and business mixed with a new Holiday Inn and a Hilton on the walk to the subway and some nice bars and restaurants.  I'd definitely stay there again.
